name: CATpay
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: Catpay is reward token for Catecoin which will be used in Rise of cats game. It's like SLP token of Axie Infinity. CatPay is a kind of universal token in the Rise of Cats world, and players can earn CatPay by playing Rise of Cats. Catpay can be used to upgrade cats in-game, pay for tournament entry fees, and unlock various future game features. All CatPay tokens are mined from the game. All CatPay spent on in-game upgrades will be burned, as well as a portion of the CatPay from tournaments.1% of the transaction volume of the marketplace will be used to buy back and burn CatPay.
